titleStmt.title: Englands sorrow for the losse of their late generall or an epitaph upon his Excellencie Robert Earle of Essex, &c. Who died September 15. 1646. with a perfect memoriall of the particular services and battels that he himself was engaged in person.
titleStmt.author: Philipot, Thomas, d. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Ley, and are to be sold at his Shop in Pauls neer Doctors Commons,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end of epitaph: Thomas Philipot.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop in Pauls neer Doctors Commons
